description: This template allows you to deploy an instance of ELK server and beats on a Linux Ubuntu VM. This will deploy a VM in the resource group location and return the FQDN of the VM. This will install the components of ELk, Beats and services to ingest logs
summary: This template allows you to deploy an instance of ELK server and beats on a Linux Ubuntu VM. This will deploy a VM in the resource group location and return the FQDN of the VM. This will install the components of ELk, Beats.
